start: KEEP WORKING! NO COMPLAINTS, NO BREAKS, NO EXCUSES!
I’VE FILLED THIS PLACE UP THE WAZOO WITH ROBOTS, NOTHING WILL HAPPEN TONIGHT!
Everyone, stay calm. We’ve got this under control!
But maybe it’s a message. What if the ghost wants us to go?
I couldn’t have said it better myself.
Be careful, this place is full of those pesky robots.
end: So how does it feel to have destroyed your worst enemy?
You know he has like 10 brothers in the banking business, right?
